channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sterling Rises Against Euro on French Politics
item.description: Sterling rose to a one-and-a-half week high against the euro on the prospect of the French government facing a no-confidence vote over its fiscal tigh...

item.title: ‘Just burst the bubble, sorry.’ Jude Law reveals why you can’t stay at the quaint cottage from cult favorite film ‘The Holiday.’
item.description: “The Holiday” star Jude Law has revealed a surprising truth about the English cottage that was featured in the 2006 Christmas movie hit.

item.title: Bitcoin Euphoria Threatens to Break These ETFs
item.description: Investors are piling into funds that seek to amplify the daily return of MicroStrategy shares, but the ETFs haven’t been working as intended in recent...

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq Futures Fall
item.description: U.S. stock futures retreated while global markets were mixed.

item.title: Metal Prices Slide; Significant Volatility Expected on Trump, China Policies
item.description: Base metal prices fell and are likely to be volatile in 2025, with pressure from a stronger dollar and trade policy shifts under Donald Trump pitted a...

item.title: My friend declared bankruptcy. Can creditors still go after him for child support, back taxes and student debt?
item.description: “Most of those old debts are credit-card debts.”

item.title: ‘It’s got a stigma attached to it’: Why a crowdfunding real estate investor bid $30 million on Diddy’s L.A. ‘freak-off’ mansion
item.description: The house flipper offered less than half of the $61.5 million asking price, and predicts a ‘painful’ future for the property

item.title: This Old House? Home Buyers' Best Deals Are on Builders' Lots
item.description: The premium that buyers have usually had to pay for a brand-new house is disappearing.

item.title: Stellantis’ shares drop after Carlos Tavares’ sudden exit as CEO
item.description: Stellantis’ indicated Carlos Tavares’ views had become misaligned with those held by the company’s board and shareholders

item.title: French stocks and bonds hit by budget and no-confidence fears
item.description: French stocks and bonds were hit on Monday on worries the country’s government may fall.
